articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Navy Unit 164
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Navy Unit 164
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, inspected KPA Navy Unit 164.
					 He was greeted by Senior Vice Admiral Ri Yong Ju, commander of the KPA Navy, Vice Admiral Ho Yong Chun, political commissar of the KPA Navy, and commanding officers of the unit.
					
					 He gave the unit a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts and had a photo session with its seamen.
					
					 He went round the room for education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to the unit's history. Seeing with keen interest the precious historic data, he recalled the undying feats of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the development of the unit which was personally organized by Kim Il Sung in May 1955.
					
					 He toured a monument to the field guidance of Kim Il Sung and high-speed transport boat No. 6251, which was examined by Kim Il Sung and whose test sailing was guided by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then he dropped in at the building of the unit command and gave important instructions for commanding and managing the unit. He set forth the tasks and ways for further building up the unit in keeping with the features of its combat duty and more thoroughly establishing the anti-Japanese guerrilla method of commanding and management.
					
					 He went round the library and servicepersons' hall of the unit.
					
					 It is needed to supply the must books to the library on a regular basis and organize writing impressions and discussion of books and oratorical meeting often for the seamen to regard the reading as part of their military service so that they can develop into many-sided persons with versatile knowledge, he said, adding: This is a shortcut to making the whole army politico-ideologically and morally stronger.
					
					 Stressing the need to run the servicepersons' hall in an effective way, he instructed the unit to concentrate efforts on the five-point education, set forth by the Party, and steadily conduct the class education, in particular.
					
					 The Supreme Commander looked round the room for general warship training.
					
					 He learnt in detail about the combat and political training, watching torpedo attack and other drills. And he clarified the main link in the whole chain that the unit should concentrate efforts on for its combat preparedness and the important matters arising in properly employing the Juche-based naval war tactics.
					
					 Noting that Generalissimo Kim Il Sung projected the all-round seaman movement decades ago, he said that various kinds of specialized training should be intensified among the seamen to prepare them as all-round seamen and death-defying corps on the sea.
					
					 He underlined the need for commanding officers to focus on having a deeper grasp of the abilities to organize and command naval battles and the art of operating warships under the actual war conditions.
					
					 He also went round barracks, education room and mess of the 1st company of the 5th flotilla under the unit to take warm care of seamen's living conditions.
					
					 Learning about the tree-planting campaign conducted by the unit this year, he gave instructions to better a nursery and intensify the campaign so as to turn the surroundings of the unit and its stationary area into a thick woodland and greenery.
					
					 He was satisfied to go round the unit, he said, expressing belief that the unit would bring about a new turn in its combat preparation and commanding and management.
					
					 Accompanying him was KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA.

articles.title: Greetings to Senegalese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Senegalese President
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Macky Sall, president of the Republic of Senegal, on Saturday on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of its independence.
					 Over the past 55 years since the independence the Senegalese people have consolidated the political independence of the country and registered great achievements in socio-economic development, the message said.
					
					 It sincerely wished the Senegalese president good health and happiness and the friendly Senegalese people greater progress and prosperity, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Russian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Russian President
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of sympathy to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, as regards the sinking of a large fishing freezer trawler in the Sea of Okhotsk of Russia which caused many human losses. 
					 The message extended deep condolences to the Russian president, victims and the bereaved families.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Russian FM
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Russian FM
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a message of sympathy to his Russian counterpart Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov on Friday over the sinking of a large fishing freezer trawler in Russia's Okhotsk Sea which left dozens of persons dead and missing.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy to the victims and their bereaved families, hoping that aftereffects of the disaster would be eradicated at an early date.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Lao Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Lao Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Mar. 24 received a reply message from Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party. 
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and on my own behalf,  express sincere thanks to you for extending warm greetings and best wishes to me on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the founding of our party.
					
					 I am convinced that you will register fresher successes in the work to develop the DPRK into a rich and powerful country under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea led by you.
					
					 I hope that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties, states and peoples of the Lao Democratic People's Republic and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will grow stronger and remain ever green. 
					
					 I wish you good health and happiness and success in your noble work.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russian and Zambian Figures
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russian and Zambian Figures
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from General Director of Arsenal-D.V. Co. Ltd. Larionov Sergei Yurievich and the manager of a Zambian company on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The gifts were conveyed to officials concerned of the DPRK working in Russia and Zambia by the general director of the Russian company and the manager of the Zambian company.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Delegation Expresses Will to Make Every Effort for Peace and Stability in Korea
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Delegation Expresses Will to Make Every Effort for Peace and Stability in Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Choe Jin Su, presidium member of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea who is leading the delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a speech at the 132nd Assembly of the Inter-Parliamentary Union on March 31. 
					 Expressing belief that the assembly would be a significant one conducive to setting the sustainable development goal since 2015, he referred to the achievements made in implementing the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) the core of which is poverty eradication adopted in 2000.
					
					 The period was particularly difficult time for the DPRK but the Korean people have made positive efforts to implement the MDGs in conformity with their actual situation, he said, and went on:
					
					 Existence and sustainable development of mankind would be unthinkable without peace and security. 
					
					 The main tasks of the DPRK at present are to turn the DPRK into an economic power and improve people's living standard. 
					
					 We urgently need peaceful environment to ensure sustainable development of economy and achieve the goals for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 We assert that the only way of preventing war and ensuring peace and stability on the Korean peninsula is to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty, reject confrontation of social systems between the north and the south and achieve national reunification by co-existing through the application of federal formula. 
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once the vicious moves to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and its right to existence and the war drills for aggression on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity. 
					
					 The Korean people will make every effort to defend peace and stability on the Korean peninsula, achieve independent and peaceful reunification of the country and bring about signal successes in the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK led by Deputy to the SPA Choe Jin Su, presidium member of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, returned home Saturday after participating in the 132nd Assembly of the Inter-Parliamentary Union held in Vietnam.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Urged to Stop Retrogressive Revision of Pension System for Government Employees
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Urged to Stop Retrogressive Revision of Pension System for Government Employees
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Trade Union of Government Employees and Service Personnel of the DPRK in a statement on Saturday extended full support to the members of the south Korean Government Employees' Union and people from all walks of life in their just actions against the authorities' retrogressive revision of the pension system for government employees.
					 The south Korean puppet forces are working hard to retrogressively revise the pension system for government employees while ruthlessly encroaching upon the vital rights of millions of the government employees and their families.
					
					 In protest against this, more than 50 trade unions of government employees and teachers in south Korea including the Government Employees' Union and the Teachers Union formed the joint action headquarters for increasing public pension and are staging various actions such as rallies, street marches and group hair-cutting against the puppet forces' retrogressive revision of the pension system for government employees.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The above-said moves are another inevitable product of the unpopular rule and predatory policy of the puppet conservative group to bleed the toiling masses white in a bid to squander funds for submitting to outsiders and escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and meeting the interests of monopoly plutocrats and bureaucrats.
					
					 It is quite impossible to escape economic catastrophe and save the people's living from destitution as long as the descendants of "yusin" going against the people's mindset are allowed to stay in power.
					
					 It is the way for the government employees and people of south Korea for living and protecting the democratic right and viral rights to sternly judge the corrupt conservative group.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S., S. Korean Forces' Moves for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S., S. Korean Forces' Moves for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK 
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff Martin Dempsey flew into south Korea a few days ago and held a confab with Chairman of the south Korean puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff Choe Yun Hui over the issue of strengthening "combined defence posture" to cope with "threats" from the north. They told rubbish that south Korea-U.S. "alliance is the core of peace and stability in Northeast Asia," crying out for "effective operation of integrated missile defence network" to cope with "nuclear and missile threats" from the north. 
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces started large-scale joint landing drill on March 30 as part of Foal Eagle in the area of Phohang, North Kyongsang Province.
					
					 Commenting on these developments, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this clearly proves that the U.S. and the south Korean forces have gone reckless in their moves to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK while tightening military collusion and nexus under the absurd pretext of "threat from the north".
					
					 Due to the U.S. and the south Korean forces' dangerous moves for a war against the north, the north-south relations have been pushed to an uncontrollable phase and the danger of the outbreak of a nuclear war has increased on the Korean peninsula, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 With neither excuses nor rhetoric can the U.S. and the puppet forces cover up their bellicose nature of escalating tensions and bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the peninsula.
					
					 What matters is that the bellicose forces at home and abroad are inviting self-destruction while crying out for "combined defence posture" and "decisive action."
					
					 If the provokers fire even a single bullet or shell into the inviolable territory of the DPRK, its army and people will blow up the base of aggression and achieve the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hits out at S. Korean Regime's Theory of "Eliminating Followers of North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hits out at S. Korean Regime's Theory of "Eliminating Followers of North"
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime has mercilessly suppressed the people from all walks of life who call for national reconciliation and unity and reunification through alliance with the north and stage actions against the war drills bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula after branding them as "followers of the north," says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The puppet regime has got frantic in kicking up the racket for eliminating "the followers of the north" since the knife attack on the U.S. ambassador. This is an anti-reunification reckless act to quench the anti-U.S., anti-regime actions mounting high among people of various circles and escalate confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The puppet regime has fabricated words "followers of the north" that can never be found in a Korean dictionary in a desperate bid to build up public opinion about them and is abusing it as a lever for strengthening its dictatorial rule and carrying out its policy of escalating confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Lurking behind this theory is an absurd theory of confrontation that those living in the north are not compatriots but "enemies" and, therefore, any act of longing for the north or having in touch with it is "act of benefiting the enemy" and "toppling the social system."
					
					 What matters is that the puppet regime is abusing the theory as a base lever for justifying its policy of confrontation against reunification.
					
					 It is its assertion that as there are a lot of inhabitants "following" the north in south Korea, it should suppress them to "protect liberal democracy" and push ahead with the "north policy" with "principle", undeterred by any public opinion. 
					
					 The above-said theory means the one of extreme confrontation with compatriots in the north and the one against reunification as it is aimed to block the national reconciliation, unity and reunification and deteriorate the north-south relations by fomenting bad blood, distrust and antagonism toward the compatriots in the north and bring a nuclear disaster to the nation. 
					
					 The puppet regime will only face a stern punishment by history and the nation and shameful ruin for trumpeting about "theory of eliminating the followers of the north."

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint Landing Drills Targeting DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S.-S. Korea Joint Landing Drills Targeting DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have kicked off large-scale joint naval maneuvers as part of Foal Eagle war games, further escalating tension on the Korean peninsula.
					 Involved in the drills staged under the signboard of "improving the capabilities for joint landing operation" were naval forces of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean puppet army and  marines, more than 7 600 in all, over 30 warships including landing craft, transport ships, Aegis destroyers and submarines, more than 80 aircraft and at least 40 amphibious armored vehicles.
					
					 Those forces for a preemptive attack staged such offensive drills as the ones for naval infiltration and coastal reconnaissance and the one for large-scale naval bombardment and air strike for wiping out forces in a targeted area.
					
					 A drill for mobilizing civilian ships for the transport of landing forces and the one of copters of the U.S. marines for taking off from and landing on transports of the south Korean puppet army and rehearsal of hurling south Korean marines into a targeted area were staged only to bring to light the aggressive nature of Foal Eagle joint military drills being termed by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces "annual and defensive".
					
					 In a nutshell, the above-said joint naval maneuvers were aimed to test large-scale landing operations under the simulated conditions of an actual war, the scenario for having ground forces and marines of the U.S. and the puppet south Korean army landed on the coasts of the DPRK.
					
					 Such grave maneuvers being staged as part of Foal Eagle aimed at "occupying Pyongyang" are being censured by the international community as a blatant challenge to regional peace and security and dangerous military actions of warmongers to ignite a nuclear war at any cost.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. and the puppet warmongers are so ridiculous as to describe their DPRK-targeted war drills as the ones for seeking "an opportunity of tightening joint military posture" and "contributing to regional peace and security in the long run."
					
					 As known, Foal Eagle war games are the largest of the south Korea-U.S. joint military drills as they are combined field mobile rehearsals aimed at mounting a surprise guerilla attack upon the DPRK.
					
					 Foal Eagle war games this year are assuming ever more provocative nature in the light of their programs and forms as they are being staged in the sky, ground and sea of south Korea for a pre-emptive attack on the DPRK, pursuant to the tailored deterrence strategy.
					
					 The trigger-happy forces are working with bloodshot eyes to realize the scenario for mounting a sudden preemptive attack upon the DPRK through rapid hurling of U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, their forward deployment and use of south Korea-U.S. combined forces.
					
					 Now peace and security on the Korean peninsula and other parts in the world are seriously harassed by the ceaseless DPRK-targeted war drills of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet war maniacs.
					
					 Now that the defusing of tension on the peninsula and mending of north-south relations are more urgently required than ever before, the above-said landing drills are lashing its service personnel and people into great fury.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will never allow the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' war moves to infringe upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 The saber-rattling of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces will only precipitate their final ruin.

articles.title: Emergency Meeting Held by Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Emergency Meeting Held by Koreans in Japan
 Tokyo, April 2 (KNS-KCNA) -- An emergency meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Education Hall of Japan in Tokyo on April 1 to denounce the Japanese police authorities for searching the houses of the chairman and the vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Present there were vice-chairpersons of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, department directors of Chongryon, leading officials of organizations and enterprises, chairpersons of the Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area, Chongryon officials and compatriots.
					
					 Vice-Chairman Pak Ku Ho said in a report that the Japanese authorities have suppressed Chongryon, regarding it as a thorn in their flesh but it is unheard-of violence that they committed outrageous politically-motivated fascist suppression of the chairman and the vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee who are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the dignified DPRK.
					
					 The political aim the Japanese police authorities seek through suppression by a base method is aimed to hurt the honor of Chongryon and infuse the anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon and anti-Koreans sentiments into the Japanese society, he noted.
					
					 There is no doubt that the government and the official residence of the prime minister of Japan were involved in the search, he said, demanding the Japanese authorities make an immediate apology.
					
					 He called for turning out as one in the struggle to defend Chongryon.
					
					 The report was followed by the explanation about the illegality and injustice of the search.
					
					 Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Eiko Tomiyama, vice-president of the Central Executive Committee of the New Socialist Party of Japan, and other Japanese made solidarity addresses.
					
					 The violence made by the Japanese authorities is unheard-of one which should not occur in Japan, they said, expressing their will to struggle against forces disliking the improved Japan-DPRK relations.
					
					 Speeches were made by Kim Yong Ju, chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Ryang Ok Chul, vice-chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Pak Yun Gi, vice-chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, and Ri Yong Hun, chairman of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon.
					
					 Solidarity greetings from overseas Koreans' organizations and Japanese solidarity organizations and public organizations were introduced at the meeting. Then, a protest letter addressed to the Japan Police Agency was read out and a protest group formed.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Urged to Apologize to Chongryon and DPRK Government
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Urged to Apologize to Chongryon and DPRK Government
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification in  the Commonwealth of Independent States issued a statement on March 31 to denounce the Japanese authorities' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement recalled that on March 26 the Japanese reactionaries hurled police gangsters into the fascist action of searching the houses of the chairman and the vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon who are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 Lurking behind the human rights abuses against the leading officials of the overseas citizens' organization of the dignified DPRK without any legal ground is a despicable aim to infuse the anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon sentiments into the Japanese society and deliberately bedevil the DPRK-Japan relations, regarding Chongryon as a thorn in flesh in a bid to justify the moves to make Japan lurch to the right and fascistize it, the statement charged.
					
					 The brigandish act committed in broad daylight in Japan which styles itself a "law governed state" is an unbearable provocation against Chongryon and the DPRK and a wanton violation of their sovereignty, it held.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad will never pardon the Japanese reactionaries' base acts of recklessly cracking down on Chongryon and pushing the DPRK-Japan relations to catastrophe once again, it warned.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop at once the reckless suppression of Chongryon and make an honest apology to Chongryon and the DPRK government for the recent search, it urged.

articles.title: Beninese Organizations Denounce Japanese Police Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Beninese Organizations Denounce Japanese Police Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on March 30 to denounce the Japanese police authorities for searching houses of the chairman and the vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement condemned Japan's brigandish suppression of Chongryon, legitimate overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK, and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 It termed the search an unprecedented violence in violation of not only Japan's constitution and the criminal procedure law but also international law. It went on:
					
					 The search by the Japanese police authorities was pursuant to a scenario of the U.S. to strangle the DPRK through the toughest "sanctions", talking about "collapse of its social system".
					
					 Chongryon is a legitimate overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK defending all democratic and national rights of the Koreans in Japan, and it plays the role of the DPRK diplomatic mission in the absence of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					
					 The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea strongly denounce the suppression of the leading officials of Chongryon as an illegal human rights abuse and an intolerable infringement on the sovereignty of the DPRK.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Political Figure Denounces Japanese Authorities for Their Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Political Figure Denounces Japanese Authorities for Their Suppression of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party released a statement on March 30 to denounce the Japanese police authorities for searching the houses of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement recalled that the Japanese police authorities suddenly searched houses of the chairman and the vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon on March 26. It went on:
					
					 It is an unprecedented illegal act in violation of not only Japan's constitution and the criminal procedure law but also international law.
					
					 Chongryon is a dignified overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK.
					
					 That's why the infringement on Chongryon and Koreans in Japan is the one on the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The Bangladesh Communist Party scathingly condemns the Japanese authorities for their brigandish suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Organization Supports Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Organization Supports Korea's Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy will dynamically conduct solidarity movement for supporting the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea with various forms and methods.
					 The group said this in a statement on March 30 responding to the appeal sent by the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea to the world progressive people.
					
					 The statement noted:
					
					 The Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea made public an appeal to the world progressive people loving peace and aspiring after independence and justice on March 8.
					
					 The appeal decided to intensify international solidarity movement according to the decision to set the "period of solidarity for supporting the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea" from June to October, 2015.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place in different countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 They included seminars in Sri Lanka and Indonesia and a lecture in Bangladesh from Mar. 27 to 30.
					
					 The chairman of the Committee of Self-Reliance Studies in Sri Lanka said that President Kim Il Sung, the eternal leader of the Korean people and the world progressives, made an immortal contribution to the human cause of independence.
					
					 The President clarified that the struggle for global independence is, in essence, the one for establishing international relations based on independence and democratizing the international community, the chairman noted, adding:
					
					 The President actively encouraged the people in colonial countries in their struggle for national liberation and rendered material and moral assistance to the newly independent countries in their building of new society.
					
					 When socialism collapsed in East European countries, he energetically led the socialist movement to reconstruction and fresh surge under the unfurled banner of independence.
					
					 The director of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia said that the whole life of Kim Il Sung was the sacred revolutionary one of the distinguished leader and peerless patriot as he glorified the 20th century as the one of triumphant advance of the cause of independence against imperialism, the cause of socialism with his outstanding ideas, theories and extraordinary leadership.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy said that the tender-hearted image of Kim Il Sung as the father of the people will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but also by progressive mankind.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Malaysia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Malaysia
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A Malaysian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed at the Dombo Enterprise Company of Malaysia on Mar. 30.
					 Chong Chingchi, manager of the company, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It fixed the celebration period from April 1 to 15 and decided to give wide publicity to the feats the President performed for the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence and the reality of the DPRK which is dynamically advancing along the road of Songun, independence and socialism under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and organize colorful political and cultural events.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in France
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Forever in High Esteem and Accomplish His Cause" was brought out in booklet by the Democrate Publishing House in France on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on Oct. 16, Juche 83 (1994), deals with the issue of strengthening the party and the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses, the issue of thoroughly implementing the party's revolutionary economic strategy, the issue of strengthening the People's Army and establishing the social atmosphere of attaching importance to the military affairs and the tasks and ways of defending and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Carried by Myanmar Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Carried by Myanmar Paper
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The gist of "Let Us Usher In a New Heyday of Building a Sports Power in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu", a letter sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to those attending the 7th National Conference of Sportspeople, was carried by the Myanmar paper Myanmar Times on Mar. 27.
					 The work, published on Mar. 25, Juche 104 (2015), deals with the fact that the Workers' Party of Korea is channeling great efforts into the sports field in order to develop the nation's sports true to President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's Juche-based idea and intention on developing sports.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks and ways of successfully realizing the party's plan on building a sports power.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Malaysian Personage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Malaysian Personage
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Though President Kim Il Sung passed away, his idea and cause will be immortal like the sun and the feats he performed for the global cause of independence will shine forever with the century.
					 Chong Chingchi, manager of the Dombo Enterprise Company of Malaysia, who was elected chairman of the Malaysian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung) said this at its inaugural ceremony held at the company on Mar. 30.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was the great master of ideology who fathered the Juche idea and opened a new chapter of the global cause of independence, and a military genius and the world's elder statesman who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and built socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 His whole life was the one of the benevolent father of the people who dedicated himself to them, regarding it as his motto to believe in them as in Heaven all his life.
					
					 He has been deeply revered not only by the Korean people but also by all other progressives of the world for the great feats he performed for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.
					
					 He was the most distinguished leader in the 20th century and the peerlessly great man.
					
					 The ceremony was attended by personages of all social strata of Malaysia and members of the organization for friendship with the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by British Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by British Body
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on Mar. 19 posted on its website an article titled "The brilliant commander's will to reunify the country in Panmunjom".
					 The article dealt with Marshal Kim Jong Un's inspection of Panmunjom three years ago.
					
					 Seeing his image, the south Korean people have been encouraged by his steadfast will and faith to implement to the letter leader Kim Jong Il's last instruction to reunify the country, the article said, adding:
					
					 South Korean people of all social strata are praising Kim Jong Un: "Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission, who solemnly declared his will to fulfill all his responsibility for accomplishing the cause of reunifying the country true to the lofty intention of the preceding leaders", "Another great brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu with pluck to make the whole world look up to Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea", "We do not forget Panmunjom, the historic place, where the firm will of the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu to reunify the country was shown" and "Korea will be reunified without fail as it is steered by supreme leader Kim Jong Un".
					
					 Media and websites said his pluck, grit and stratagem are winning the admiration of the world and that he makes a decisive decision and takes action at once, and that once he is determined, he does not hesitate.
					
					 They noted that Korea will be reunified without fail thanks to another tiger of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was carried by the Romanian paper Romania Muncitoare on Mar. 31.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that to preserve the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction serves as a basic principle to be maintained in the accomplishment of socialist cause and the tasks and ways of realizing it.

articles.title: WPK's Cause Supported by Peruvian Personages
articles.content:
WPK's Cause Supported by Peruvian Personages
						
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Personages of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru expressed support and solidarity with the just cause of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people.
					 Chairman of the front Genaro Ledesma Izquieta and its General Secretary Cati Campos in their speeches at an event marking its 52nd founding anniversary on Mar. 27 said that the DPRK is the best socialist country in the world.
					
					 The DPRK has been built into the country where its people are living in harmony while exercising full-fledged and equal rights as masters of the state, society and politics under the guidance of the great leaders and party, they noted, adding:
					
					 The Korean people are firmly defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation and socialism while smashing the vicious hostile moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers. 
					
					 The DPRK is the nuclear weapons state enough to beat back any aggressors at one blow. Even the U.S. dares not to provoke the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman and the general secretary extended steadfast international support and solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people in their just cause for final victory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 164 de fuerzas navales del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 164 de fuerzas navales del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la unidad 164 de las fuerzas navales del EPC.
					Le acogieron el coronel general de las fuerzas navales Ri Yong Ju, comandante de las fuerzas navales del EPC, el vicealmirante Ho Yong Chun, comisario politico de las fuerzas navales del EPC, y los comandantes de la unidad.
					
					Tras dar a la unidad el binoculo y el fusil automatico como recuerdo, se retrato con los marineros.
					
					Estuvo en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					Viendo con atencion los valiosos objetos de interes historico, el Mariscal recordo con gran emocion las indelebles hazanas de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, impregnadas en la historia de desarrollo de la unidad, organizada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung en mayo de 1955.
					
					Dio vuelta por el monumento a la visita de orientacion del Presidente y la lancha rapida de transporte no.6251 cuya navegacion de ensayo fue dirigida por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Recorriendo el edificio de la comandancia de la unidad, el Comandante Supremo dio preciosas instrucciones que se presentan en el comando y la administracion de la unidad.
					
					Presento las tareas y remedios para acondicionar mejor la unidad conforme al caracter de su mision de combate y establecer con mayor firmeza el metodo de comando y administracion de la unidad al estilo de la guerrilla antijaponesa.
					
					Acto seguido, Kim Jong Un estuvo en la biblioteca y la casa de los militares.
					
					En la biblioteca, dijo que se debe suministrar normalmente a ella los libros de lectura obligatoria y organizar a menudo la escritura de impresiones, la presentacion de impresiones de los libros leidos y el encuentro de oratoria.
					
					Asi los marineros consideraran la lectura como una parte de su servicio militar y los militares podran obtener amplios conocimientos, apunto y agrego que eso es el atajo de la conversion del EPC en el ejercito ideo-politica y moralmente poderoso.
					
					En la sala de los militares, instruyo administrarla bien, prestar atencion a la profundizacion de la educacion de 5 tipos presentada por el Partido y sobre todo, desarrollar constantemente la educacion clasista.
					
					En su recorrido por la sala de ejercicios generales de navio, vio diversos entrenamientos, inclusive el ejercicio de asalto con torpedo.
					
					Tras averiguar en detalles el estado de ejercicios de combate y politicos, enseno lo clave de los preparativos de combate de la unidad y los importantes problemas que se presentan en la aplicacion exacta de los autoctonos metodos de combate maritimo.
					
					Al recordar que hace decenas de anos, el Presidente tomo la iniciativa de desarrollar la campana de prepararse como marinero omnipotente, subrayo que los marineros deben intensificar los ejercicios especializados para que se preparen como los omnipotentes y los defensores a ultranza del mar.
					
					Enseno que los comandantes deben esforzarse por ser diestros en la organizacion y mando de combate maritimo en las circunstancias iguales a la batalla real y en el manejo del buque.
					
					El Comandante Supremo recorrio el dormitorio, la sala de educacion y los comedores de los marineros de la compania no.1 de la 5a escuadra adscrita a la unidad atendiendo las condiciones de vida de ellos.
					
					Se cercioro del estado de plantacion de arboles realizada este ano por la unidad y ordeno acondicionar bien la almaciga y dinamizar la siembra con la meta de convertir en areas verdes la zona periferica de la unidad y el reparto de su estacionamiento.
					
					Diciendo que recorrio con satisfaccion la unidad, expreso esperanza y conviccion de que se registrara nuevo viraje en los preparativos de combate y el comando y administracion de ella.
					
					Le acompano en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam desea progreso y prosperidad al pueblo de Senegal
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam desea progreso y prosperidad al pueblo de Senegal 
						
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 4 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica del Senegal, Macky Sall, con motivo del 55o aniversario de la independencia de este pais. 
					En su misiva, el remitente senala que durante 55 anos pasados despues de la independencia, el pueblo senegales ha consolidado la independencia politica del pais y alcanzado grandes exitos en el desarrollo socioeconomico. 
					
					Le expresa conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas en varios dominios y le desea de todo corazon al destinatario buena salud y felicidad y al amistoso pueblo senegales mayor progreso y prosperidad.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a Putin
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a Putin
						
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, en relacion con que causo perdidas humanas el hundimiento de un barco frigorifico con red barredera en el mar Okhotsk de Rusia.
					En su misiva, el remitente expreso profunda compasion y condolencias al destinatario, las victimas y sus familiares.

articles.title: Canciller coreano envia mensaje de condolencias a su homologo ruso
articles.content:
Canciller coreano envia mensaje de condolencias a su homologo ruso
						
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de condolencias a su homologo ruso, Serguei Viktorovich Lavrov, en relacion con que el hundimiento de un barco frigorifico con red barredera en el mar Okhotsk de Rusia dejo como saldo decenas de muertos y desaparecidos.
					En su misiva el remitente expreso profunda compasion y condolencias a las victimas y sus familiares y deseo que se recuperen cuanto antes las consecuencias y desgracias causadas por el accidente.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de Choummaly Sayasone
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de Choummaly Sayasone
						
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de respuesta que le enviara el 24 de marzo el Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, Choummaly Sayasone.
					El texto senala: 
					
					Le expreso a Vd. el sincero agradecimiento en nombre del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y en el mio propio por haberme enviado cordial saludo y excelentes votos con motivo del 60o aniversario de fundacion del PPRL.
					
					Estoy convencido de que bajo la sabia orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por Vd., se alcanzaran nuevos y mayores exitos en las labores para desarrollar la RPDC como un pais prospero. 
					
					Deseo que se amplien y se desarrollen mas y sean eternas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos, los dos Estados y los dos pueblos de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Formulo votos por buena salud y felicidad de Vd. y exitos en su noble trabajo.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion de RPDC expone voluntad de esforzarse por paz y estabilidad de Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion de RPDC expone voluntad de esforzarse por paz y estabilidad de Peninsula Coreana
						
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, Choe Jin Su, quien preside la delegacion de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, pronuncio discurso en la sesion plenaria de la 132a Asamblea General de la Union Interparlamentaria, efectuada el 31 de marzo. 
					Choe expreso la conviccion de que la presente reunion sera un encuentro importante para contribuir a la elaboracion de la meta de desarrollo sostenido despues de 2015 y se refirio a los exitos alcanzados en el cumplimiento de la meta de desarrollo del milenio enfocada en eliminar la pobreza, aprobada en 2000. 
					
					Para la RPDC fue especialmente dificil ese periodo, pero el pueblo coreano hizo ingentes esfuerzos por cumplir la meta del milenio acorde a las condiciones reales del pais, dijo y continuo:
					
					La subsistencia de la humanidad y el desarrollo sostenido son inconcebibles sin la paz y seguridad. 
					
					En la actualidad, la tarea principal de la RPDC es la construccion de una potencia economica y la mejora de las condiciones de vida del pueblo. 
					
					El ambiente pacifico es lo imprescindible para nuestro pais empenado en asegurar la tendencia de ascenso sostenido de la economia y alcanzar la meta de construccion de un Estado prospero. 
					
					Insistimos en que la unica via para prevenir la guerra y preservar la paz y la estabilidad en la Peninsula Coreana es sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio por el Convenio de Paz, rechazar el enfrentamiento de regimenes entre ambas partes coreanas y lograr la reunificacion nacional a modo de coexistencia segun el sistema federal.
					
					Urgimos a EE.UU. parar su campana de aplastamiento tendente a acabar con la soberania y el derecho a la vida de la RPDC y los ejercicios belicos de caracter agresivo en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno. 
					
					El pueblo coreano hara todo lo posible por preservar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana, lograr la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais y registrar un cambio trascendental en la construccion de un Estado prospero.

articles.title: Portavoz de sindicato norcoreano expresa apoyo a la lucha de funcionarios publicos surcoreanos
articles.content:
Portavoz de sindicato norcoreano expresa apoyo a la lucha de funcionarios publicos surcoreanos
						
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central del Sindicato de Funcionarios Publicos y Trabajadores de Servicio de Corea hizo publica el dia 4 una declaracion para enviar el apoyo total y solidaridad a la justa lucha de los miembros del sindicato de funcionarios publicos y los habitantes de diferentes sectores del Sur de Corea contra las pretensiones de las autoridades de modificar el sistema de pension para empleados publicos.
					La nota senala que actualmente, los titeres surcoreanos tratan de enmendar dicho sistema violando flagrantemente el derecho de vida de millones de funcionarios publicos y sus familiares, y prosigue:
					
					Mas de 50 sindicatos de funcionarios publicos y educadores del Sur de Corea, incluyendo el Sindicato Nacional de Trabajadores Publicos y el Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes, organizaron la direccion de lucha conjunta por el aumento de la pension publica. Y llevan a cabo las protestas de diferentes formas sobre la modificacion del sistema de pension como mitines, la marcha y el pelado al rape.
					
					La intencion de reformar el sistema de pension de funcionarios publicos es otro producto inevitable de la politica antipopular y de saqueo de la banda conservadora surcoreana que recauda los impuestos pagados con sangre y sudor por los habitantes para malgastarlos en las practicas de servilismo a las fuerzas foraneas y la campana de confrontacion fratricida y defiende unicamente los intereses de los monopolistas y provechos personales de los burocratas.
					
					Sera imposible evitar la bancarrota economica y la depauperacion de vida popular mientras se mantengan en el poder los descendientes de la "renovacion" que dan espaldas a la opinion publica.
					
					En castigar rotundamente a la corrupta banda de autoridades titeres esta la salvacion de los funcionarios publicos y otros habitantes y la via de defender los derechos democraticos y el de vida.
